answers.answer: I have to watch what I eat because im a high risk pregnancy because I have high blood pressure and diabetes so I eat alot of vegetables, chicken and drink alot of water try to stay away from all of the sugary foods
Fruits & veges. Greek yogurts, milk, cheese. If you a really worried about it, you can talk to about dietician.

question: I'm a ftm. And I'm just at my 5 week mark. I've been trying to eat healthy.. But when I go to eat... Idk what to eat that's healthy. Any suggestions on good healthy food for 2? :)
title: good foods.
